Package is.hi.hbv501g.hbv1.controllers

Class QuestionController

java.lang.Object
is.hi.hbv501g.hbv1.controllers.QuestionController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="api/v1/question") public class QuestionController extends Object
API to handle QuestionDTO objects. Append /question to the base URL to access these endpoints.
Since:
2023-11-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Andri Fannar Kristj√°nsson, afk6@hi.is. Converted to REST API 2024-02-15.

  • Method Details

    • getAllQuestions

      @RequestMapping(value="/getAll", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<List<QuestionDTO>>> getAllQuestions()
      Get all Questions saved to the API. Append /getAll to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Returns:
      List of all Questions saved to the API as a List of QuestionDTO.

    • getAllQuestionsInList

      @RequestMapping(value="/getAllInList", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<List<QuestionDTO>>> getAllQuestionsInList(@RequestParam List<Long> questionIDs)
      Get all Questions with corresponding ID from a List of IDs. Append /getAllInList to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      questionIDs - IDs of all Questions to fetch.
      Returns:
      List of all Questions with corresponding IDs as a List of QuestionDTO.

    • saveQuestion

      @RequestMapping(value="/create", method=POST) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<QuestionDTO>> saveQuestion(@RequestBody QuestionDTO question)
      Create a new Question and save it to storage. Append /create to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      question - QuestionDTO object to save.
      Returns:
      HTTPStatus 200.

    • updateQuestion

      @RequestMapping(value="/update", method=PUT) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<QuestionDTO>> updateQuestion(@RequestBody QuestionDTO updatedQuestion)
      Update a stored Question. Append /update to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      updatedQuestion - QuestionDTO with updated info.
      Returns:
      HTTPStatus 200.

    • deleteQuestion

      @RequestMapping(value="/deleteQuestion/{questionID}", method=DELETE) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<QuestionDTO>> deleteQuestion(@PathVariable("questionID") Long questionID)
      Delete a Question from storage. Append /deleteQuestion/{questionID} to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      questionID - ID of Question to delete.
      Returns:
      HTTPStatus 200 if successful. HTTPStatus 404 if Question is not found. HTTPStatus 409 if Question has dependencies.
